titleStmt.title: A Character of the true blue Protestant poet, or, The pretended author of The character of a popish successor
titleStmt.author: Settle, Elkanah, 1648-1724. Character of a popish successor.

notesStmt.note: The character of a popish successor was written by Elkanah Settle.
Fully described in: Macdonald, H. John Dryden, a bibliography, 1939, no. 218 (B).
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
